text:
llowing: Examine the following: 
Temp Pulse BP Temp Pulse BP Temp Pulse BP 
Respiratory rate Respiratory rate Respiratory rate MUAC 
Pale? YES NO Pale? YES NO Pale? YES NO 
If breastfeeding: are nipples cracked? YES NO If breastfeeding: are nipples cracked? YES NO If breastfeeding: are nipples cracked? YES NO
